Learning Materials
==================

Publications
------------

- 💡 - (2022) `URL (JOSS) <https://joss.theoj.org/papers/10.21105/joss.02869>`_ Pyinterpolate: Spatial interpolation in Python for point measurements and aggregated datasets


Blog posts
----------

- 📜 - (2022) `URL (Ordinary Kriging) <https://ml-gis-service.com/index.php/2021/10/31/data-science-interpolate-air-quality-measurements-with-python/>`_ Interpolate Air Quality Measurements with Python,
- 📜 - (2022) `URL (Area-to-Point Poisson Kriging) <https://ml-gis-service.com/index.php/2022/12/09/get-more-from-crime-rate-data-and-other-socio-economic-indicators-with-pyinterpolate/>`_ Get More from Crime Rate Data and Other Socio-Economic Indicators with Pyinterpolate,
- 📜 - (2022) `URL (Theoretical Variograms) <https://ml-gis-service.com/index.php/2022/04/01/geostatistics-theoretical-variogram-models/>`_ Geostatistics: Theoretical Variogram Models
- 📜 - (2022) `URL (Kriging - General) <https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/interpolate-air-pollution-pyinterpolate-szymon-moliński/>`_ Interpolate Air Pollution with Pyinterpolate


Presentations & Workshops
-------------------------

- 🎙️ - (2022) 🇵🇱 `URL (Poisson Kriging) <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sSx-OxMzxN0>`_ Wzbogacanie agregowanych danych publicznych z Pythonem i Geostatystyką
